website_summaries.verdict: A simple and affordable anti-snoring device that's worth a try for mild or moderate snorers.
pros: Works with magnets to open the nostrils gently to reduce snoring
Silicone exterior is soft and comfortable in the nose
You get two clips plus a convenient storage case for a low price
cons: Clips have a chemical odor when they are new

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Better Nights Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I definitely feel more rested since using these anti snore devices. Im certainly getting a better night's sleep. The wife has said it has decreased the amount I snore. For the price, it's a great product and is better than going in for surgery.
customer_reviews.author: J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Small, lost one pair
customer_reviews.text: This product works!! I don’t know how but it does. Better than the nose strips! Finally a great nights sleep! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working. Dramatic reduction in snoring and better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly L. Penninger

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This anti snoring device is comfortable and easy to use. I am finally getting the sleep I need! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Smells toxic
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Could not use because the plastic was chemical smelling. Let it sit for a week and still you get a chemical inhale of off-gassing toxic smell. Not bothering to return. Also gave me an immediate headache.
customer_reviews.author: Nimnal

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. It reduces snoring significantly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Igor P.

customer_reviews.title: Useless, anti snore device, Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I still snore, and this device had zero effect on both of us. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: teresa t

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that you place it in your nose securly, and that it is in comfortably
customer_reviews.text: The package came in a small little box containing two anti snore devices to be put into your nose. I was glad that it came with two. Both my partner and myself have been loud snorers since we have gained weight. While we are on a fitness plan to get to healthier weights and living, these antisnore devices have greatly helped to make the snoring much quieter. While it has not taken aware every sound of snoring , it has turned the dial of the snores from a 10 to a 3. That has been amazing results and allowed everyone in the house to get a better nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: GODDESS

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: Kept one for myself; gave one to my brother. We are both pleased with this product and are both sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help at all
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure of the purpose of the magnets. I’ve used similar devices that seemed to help some. I actually felt like this device obstructed my breathing even more. Disappointed. Was hopeful but alas i will continue to search.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Haven't notice any decrease in snoring. But i Just started using it
customer_reviews.author: Airborn

customer_reviews.title: No More Monster Snoring
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, I had been having sleepless nights and sometimes interrupted sleep due to his monstrous snoring. I am a light sleeper so I need to fall asleep first and I need a sleep environment that is calm. He first said he would not wear this type of device on his nose, but agreed finally. It was comfortable based on what he said and I noticed a drastic difference. We have a winner! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Cue I.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed they didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work, and while I found thm easy to use and comfortable to wear, they did not do anything to improve my breathing. I couldn't tell any difference whether they were in or not.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy fix for snoring and interrupted sleep
customer_reviews.text: My spouse has been often sleeping in another room bc evidently I snore. I bought this for spouse's benefit, with great success. There have hardly been any late night bed switches, but the real surprise is that my sleep has improved! Such an easy fix for us both to get a better night's rest.
customer_reviews.author: G. G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Company offers gift card for good reviews
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. Husband snores through his nose which this product says it works for. There is no reason why this product WOULD work but I was desperate and ordered it. The only reason it gets 5 starts is because they offer a $10 gift card for good reviews
customer_reviews.author: Anna G.

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: Cant really tell if it stops the snoring since I was asleep; however, I do feel much better in the morning when wake up. It does help to have a better quality of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Wen F.

customer_reviews.title: Try this before anything
customer_reviews.text: If you breathe through your nose and you snore this product works.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: no surprise
customer_reviews.text: didn't do a thing...total waste of money... Just don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: gotsandals

customer_reviews.title: Need to get used to the feel of it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but comes off during the night. Also need to get used to the feel of it. It must tickle my nose at night so I scratch it off.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, cuts noise level down a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he snores like a bear, I usually have to wear earplugs. So I got these for him because he is flying on a redeye overseas and didn't want to be "That Guy" on the plane that keeps everyone up with his deafening bear snoring... he testified it out last night and... I have to say that I didn't need my earplugs, it cut the noise volume down 85% .... he still snored a little and made noise but the volume of it was much more tolerable. I would recommend these to someone who snores so loud they could wake the dead. It won't cure it, but it will be a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: It is working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father, he snores a lot and my mother complained all the time. Since they are visiting us I decided to buy this and let my father use it to see if it helps him. The true is that it is really helping him, my mother seems happy with the situation. Sometimes he still snore a little but its not like before, we would say that this device help him not to snore like 90% of what was before. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Victogenia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: So sorry to say, but this didn't make one bit of a difference. Dang! After 55 years of my love's thunderous snores, I've been trying to find something that may help him (not me, I'm used to it) sleep better. This was not it. He doesn't have sleep apnea either. I'll keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Narby

customer_reviews.title: I don’t snore loudly anymore.
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé sleeps on and off because I snore loudly. I felt conscious and bothered if it will affect our relationship. I searched remedies and found this nose clip. Now, every time I ask him how he’d sleep, he will say that he sleeps well and didn’t hear me snoring! I’m so happy For him and confident to sleep with him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longer in the guest room!
customer_reviews.text: I don't always snore, but when I do I get sent to the guest room. The silicone anti-snore device works pretty well. It takes a while to get used to where to place it in your nose, but you want to make sure those passages are opened up. If I get it in the wrong place, it's a bit to tight with the magnets (hence the 4 for comfort). It won't stop snoring from "gunk" on the back of your throat, but I usually use a long gargle of mouthwash to stop that. But it really keeps your airways more open. I'm happy with it and have put one of the two in my travel kit.
customer_reviews.author: microcameraguy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but not comfortable to use it every night
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not comfortable using it and the first time he used this, snoring still there. I haven’t try it yet
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in my nose.
customer_reviews.text: I never managed to get much of a chance to use this since it WILL NOT stay in my nose. How do people actually sleep with this in all night long? It pinches a little...but that’s not too big of a deal. If it pinched more (and I was in pain) then it would probably stay in, but then I wouldn’t be able to sleep so what would be the point?
customer_reviews.author: J. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and confortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this as a Christmas present since I snore - sometimes badly. The device was very easy to use and comfortable. I barely know I have it in my nose. There are many causes for snoring and this device may have slightly reduced my snoring but did not eliminate it. To prospective buyers - I would recommend still purchasing this device since it is low cost and it may work very well for other people and possibly eliminating snoring in some people. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: SusanA

customer_reviews.title: Stop snoring now!!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying almost everything to stop snoring, mostly to save my marriage and to improve my sleep and overall health. I tried the Neti pot, nose-sprays, gargling, raising my head with an extra pillow and humidifiers. None of these worked or made a difference. I saw this nose clip on Instagram, and it was very inexpensive so I thought I'd give it a try. After the first night my wife noticed the difference and we have been sleeping better and getting a great nights sleep ever since. Just wanted to share my experience to hopefully help others who are suffering with this snoring problem. Try the Nose Clip, this thing works!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect this product to work as it looked so simple. Though it far exceeded my expectations. It really controls snoring very well, is easy to use, and is very comfortable as well. I use one at home and keep the other in my carry on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: A nice suprise
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this hoping alleviate or at least minimize my snoring. I was a bit skeptical to be honest. After purchasing, and receiving my Snore Nose Clips I still wasn't sold. Now I have used my clips several times and I must say that they are both comfortable and they actually work for me. I know everyone is different and they may not be for everyone, but, they are easy to wear and my snoring is indeed reduced. I have tried with and without since my purchase and it is noticeably different with my clip in. If you are on the fence and have tried other things, give these a try, it may just surprise you too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but keeps falling out
customer_reviews.text: I tried the magnetic anti snore nose clip because I haven't seen any other anti snore product I thought I could sleep with. (I hate anything touching my face except my pillow when I sleep.) It seems to do the trick. My husband says I snore much less, and it's comfortable enough. My only problem is it falls out during the night. I'm not sure if I knock it out myself or it just falls out. I assume I'm wearing it properly, though the instructions aren't very specific. Anyway, it's small and clear so it can be hard to find in the morning. All in all I'm pleased with it, and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a world of difference in reducing my snoring. I was soon going to have to move to another room so I didn’t keep my wife up all night, but with this, all is good. It is very easy to use, so comfortable I don’t even know I am wearing it, and most importantly has virtually eliminated my snoring. A first class product at a great price, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and it works
customer_reviews.text: Thought this might not work, I was surprised. Made it so much easier to breathe. The first two nights I had a nose bleed in the morning. Not sure if the Nose Clip was the issue because after a week the nose bleeds ended. All was well and I've been sleeping great! Would recommend to others. Got one for my grandson too. He loves it. The only problem is their so small and sometimes fall out and get lost in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: ASchwartz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very effective
customer_reviews.text: For such a simple device, this works great. You can immediately feel the increase in air that flows into your nose. It is similar to when you put one of those BreatheRight strips on. And it is very comfortable, as you only feel a mild pressure against the middle wall of your nose. This mild pressure almost feels soothing actually, as if it was a acupressure point. I've been sleeping great with it on. More comfortable than the Breathe Right strips which fall off eventually also.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Allergy Relief
customer_reviews.text: For those who suffer from sinus/allergy or other respiratory issues that affect their sleep, these nose clips might help. They seem to ease my breathing at night (I cannot attest whether they help with snoring, my dog has a "don't ask don't tell" policy). I am a side sleeper, and because of allergies I sometimes feel like my nasal passages "collapse" or are blocked. This device helps. I keep them on my nightstand -- each clip comes with a handy plastic container -- and they are easy to put on, and they stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Z. R.

customer_reviews.title: Falls out during sleep
customer_reviews.text: It won’t stay in my nose through the night. Always falls out. I feel that it helps my nose breathing as soon as I put it in. It just won’t stay in while I moving around in my sleep. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Reed

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: Still debating if it works or not. Has it's on and offs. One night would not be snoring and the other night would snoring like crazy. If I don't wear it however, I snore consistently.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Slips off during sleep
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is small and discreet so that it's portable and not really visible. I normally use a CPAP, but it's cumbersome to travel with, so I was excited to find this product. However, I'm not convinced of its efficacy because my boyfriend can still hear my snoring. It MAY help reduce my snoring or make it quieter, but the change appears to be minimal. The other issue is that every time I've used it, when I wake up, I realize that it's slipped off during my sleep. Fortunately, it wasn't very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical at first because there are many products out there that claims to stop snoring. When I viewed the video on how this product came about I decided to give it a try. The first couple of days took some getting use to. By the third night I hardly notice it on my nose. I have sleep apnea and this seems to completely stopped it. I can breathe better at night and feel more rested in the morning. The biggest benefit is that not only am I getting a good night's sleep but my wife no longer is kept awake by me pulling zzzz's all night.
customer_reviews.author: TTT

customer_reviews.title: Better Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I like that these nose clips are easy to use and pretty comfortable to wear all night. Once you get used to them in your nose, they almost disappear. As to better sleep, my wife hasn't complained too much. The first night I used these nose clips, I felt a bit more rested. After that, I may have just gotten used to the increased sleep quality. The company seems very focused on customer service and they shipped the product very quickly. One thing for them to consider is providing different sizes for various size noses.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Embarrassed to say but I snore terribly or so I’m told. Saw this product and thought the price was worth trying even if I ended up pitching it. I use it almost every night (I’ve had them since around Christmas 2019) and I’m told the snoring has completely stopped. It takes a minute to get used to because you’re putting it on a sensitive part on the inside of your nose, but after that initial uncomfortableness wears off it is worth stopping the snoring.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I actually have been using this for the past 3 weeks and it has helped alot! It's weird at first to have something in your nose at night but it's not uncomfortable. If I could get in the habit of not losing these in my bedsheets then i'll be perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Hubbart

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband been not getting a good night sleep, unless he leave and goes into spare bedroom. Says I snore and when really tired i get louder (that's when he has to leave) So I researched and after reading reviews on all the different things out there you can buy to help with snoring I choose this one. I made a good choice, I don't wake my husband anymore and if he happens to wake up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom he says I'm snoring but it's a very soft low sound and he is able to get right back to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Rose McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I am suffering from allergies, so my nose get congested at night, and I wake up with a headache. I have been on nasal sprays for at least two years. The Anti Snoring Device Silicone has with God's Grace solved my problems. I have had this product on November 19, and I have been using it daily. I am off my nasal sprays now. I forgot to use it/wear it a couple of nights, and I woke up with a headache, so I am convinced that the Anti Snoring Device works. I am very satisfied with the product. I told my mother, sister, and friends about it. I think it is the best thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia El Metwally

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review
customer_reviews.text: I've been recording my snoring sound while i am asleep before and after this product purchase. So, I have been using it for a week now, it does not work always. however, my snoring is much reduced than before.I cannot say it does not work, but it is working somehow. It is very easy to use. Very comfortable and it will give you cool nose piercing look. I would definitely recommend to anyone who snores.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It has only been 2 nights, but so far so good. Snoring is way down.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Much better sleep
customer_reviews.text: My snoring has been a problem for a long time. It would wake me at least 6 times a night with awful dry mouth. The first night I used the Magnetic Anti Snore Nose Clip, I only woke once and that was not from snoring. I can breathe better through my nose and sleep through the night without dry mouth. I have been using this product every night for over 6 weeks and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Terri V

customer_reviews.title: What a SCAM!
customer_reviews.text: I've snored for years, and really want to stay married, so I'm always willing to try something new. Saw this product and thought I'd give it a shot. What a scam. Its a little peice of rubber with two magnets, maybe the whole thing is a size of a nickel or smaller. Put it on, not super comfortable, but not bad. Wife said I snored within 5 minutes of falling asleep, and within an hour of wearing it, it fell off. Still not sure the "science" behind it. Two little magnets?? It doesn't separate your nasal passage... not sure what it is "supposed" to do... but all it did for me was lose my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anti-snoring device
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a few weeks now and they appear to work!!! They are comfortable, unobtrusive and the snoring is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with results so far!
customer_reviews.text: I had similar clips in a sturdier, hard plastic. These are soft and pliable and I wondered if they would work well. Now that I've been using them for over a week, I can honestly say that I've have less awake periods during the night since wearing them. Now, I often wake up in the morning in the same position I was in when i went to sleep. I don't know if they help my snoring, but I'll take a better nights sleep for now! I may use my snore app and see how my snoring patterns have changed. Would definitely recommend trying one.
customer_reviews.author: Loving the 60 somethings

customer_reviews.title: They tried to change me to change my review
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: They tried to BRIBE me to give them a 5 star rating. I was like sure, give me a refund, but I don't need a gift card. Then they said, but will you change your review? Don't trust their reviews. Do research on it first. It is two flappy pieces of plastic with a metal piece. It easily falls out of the nose, and I have no idea how this is supposed to stop snoring. It doesn't hold the nose open or anything. It's also itchy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Frank

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a MIRACLE!!! It works so well, my boyfriend used to snore quite loud and now he doesn’t at all! I can’t recommend buying this more if you want a restful night sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, it's a very effective and cheap solution against snoring! You can immediately feel it's easier to breathe as soon as you put them in. I both love and hate that it's so small; love because it's easy to use and take with you when traveling, hate because it usually doesn't stay in my nose all night and then gets lost in the sheets. Lost 2 out of 4 within the first 10 days. The fact that I'm unable to keep them in all night is the only reason I'm giving it four instead of 5 stars,
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I stopped snoring
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my husband said I snore too loud (as if he didn't snore too). Although this is a small product I find myself taking it off in the middle of the night by either rubbing my nose (because it moves and can sort of tickle) or by it falling off while moving in my sleep. I does feel like it helps you breathe better but I'm not sure I keep it on long enough during the night to know if its working.
customer_reviews.author: RandiV

customer_reviews.title: Really reduces and STOPS Snoring!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been married 22 years and my husbands snoring gets worse every year. It's so hard to fall asleep and stay asleep with the noise. I figured I would try this to see, what did I have to lose right?? I bought it for Valentines day :) He has been using it for the past few weeks and the snoring has gotten considerably less some nights and stops some nights! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Washburn

customer_reviews.title: It really works...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitating to buy it, because of all scams and many adds on facebook but after reading reviews and affordable price, I decided to give it a try... well my wife told me that it did help 95% and my throats was not as dry as before.. The only issue that i have is that once or twice a week it falls out of my nose... but no big deal. Maybe i will use some type glue or something lol... Overall im happy with purchase and i do recommend to anyone that reads my review..
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was curious about this device after reading reviews. I bought this for a family trip to Disneyland in December because my kids complain that when we share a room I snore really loud. Well this worked so good that the whole family was rested and ready to go have fun each day. My wife said there was only faint snoring one night. I have been telling friends about this product and I endorse this as a new believer. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: TySon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other types of nasal inserts, this one is definitely the most comfortable and it works.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Workman

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: So I've been told that I snore at night. Sometimes a lot. So saw an ad for these on Instagram and wanted to try it. Took me a few days to get used to having them in my nose at night but they were never uncomfortable. When I wake up I do notice that I've slept better and can breathe better in the morning. I have allergies and have always tended to be a mouth breather so these really seem to help. If I ever date again I'll have to update this to see if it has curbed my snoring. Until then, I will continue to use this every night to help me breathe a little easier. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: These are garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage - completely fraudulent claim that this stops snoring. Smells like cheap PVC plastic in your nose as well. I bought these because of all the 5 star reviews but just as I thought - there is no possible way this stops or even reduces snoring. My wife woke me up all night becuase I was snoring so much. I threw them away immediately. Don’t buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Right away I noticed I slept better. I also noticed that my sinuses did NOT get clogged up! Awesome! It is easier to breathe that is for sure. A few tiny things. I find it to be a tad bit itchy but I have really sensitive skin. I also noticed that if I lay on my back, I will still snore, however, my snoring in other positions is much reduced. I did lose one already but now I know to remove it before I get up to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night, then I just put it back in when I get back in bed. Easy! Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Canino

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't make my snoring go away completely, but my wife told me that it has decreased my snoring. It does take a little bit to get used to it when it's in my nose, and I guess some nights i move around too much, there will be some mornings where i wake up with it still in my nose and some mornings where it fell out, and i had to search for where it fell, but overall it does help my snoring a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great company stands by what it promises, product worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the nose one. It was comfortable and easy to use but I was still snoring as per my fiancè and he kept complaining I still snore. However with product the company has a little note explaining that snoring comes from nose or mouth and they are willing to send me the mouth one if I don't see results. Sure enough they stood by what they promised. Send me the mouth piece and I no longer snore! Its a great product and company stands behind its products. Give them a chance and they will make it right as some things may work others may not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Anguelova

customer_reviews.title: Buggerlike!
customer_reviews.text: I am reminded of why I don’t like things hanging on my nose. It didn’t open anything up. My breathing wasn’t improved. If anything it was just something foreign blocking my air passages a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Skyrunner855

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: For me I didn't completely stop snoring. My wife told me I have decreased the amount I do snore. So it has somewhat worked for me, which I am still pleased. It feels like there is a hard booger in my nose. It takes a bit to get used to. And at times it has fallen out and ended up somewhere in my bed. Overall it's a good product and has helped my snoring
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this product and I know my husband appreciates his sleep now lol I recently found out I was pregnant and snoring became a problem... I wasn't letting my husband sleep After buying this product - My snoring has gone away!! :) My husband loves that we both get a great nights rest. Sometimes I do push it off when I sleep - but always find my way back to it! Love this product! Def. recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: So I was skeptical - I have to say I have been pleasantly surprised. My wife tells me my snoring has been significantly reduced and I wake up with much clearer sinuses. I use the product in conjunction with saline spray as it’s so dry mud-winter. They’re are comfortable to use, although they do occasionally fall out - my fault. Would recommend giving them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Szohlman

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Waited on doing a review for these because wanted to give them a little bit of time to review. I bought these for my boyfriend because he has been using nose strips for ever. I thought as much as i spent on nose strips why not give these a try. They work great. He said it felt a little weird at first and he had to get used to them but after a night or two he said he got used to them. I don't hear any snoring hardly at all. After some heavy drinking and hes hammered there is a little bit but nothing like before.
customer_reviews.author: Jaleena

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: The nice thing about these clips is they are small and can travel in your purse. The first time I used them I was surprised by how I could breathe better. I've used them now for a few weeks and I'm not snoring. One morning, I got up took it out but then got back in bed only to wake myself up from snoring! And this morning my husband left on a trip, leaned over the bed to kiss me goodbye and didn't even notice them on my nose! He doesn't even know I have them! I'm sleeping much better and more comfortable than sitting up all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: BF says I'm not so loud
customer_reviews.text: So far, the nose clip is working for me. My boyfriend says I'm not as loud as usual. This was a better option than medicine or surgery. The clip itself is more or less comfortable. I personally don't like wearing any type of device that I can feel so I'm biased. The clip is barely noticeable, but because I "know" it's there I feel a little uncomfortable. Overall, I usually forget it's there by the time I nod off to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps you breathe better!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say anything about the snoring as my girlfriend has not heard me snore while using (she sleeps like a rock). I can say that this nose clip does open up the nasal cavities and helps you breathe better immediately! It could very well stop snoring. Easy to use but does take a little to get used to. Overall great product I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and opens up your nasal passages
customer_reviews.text: This product was super comfortable and was very easy to use. It feels kind of weird when you initially put it in your nostrils but the material of the piece as well as the magnetic pieces at the end gives it a nice security. They feel a little bit like it might come out in the middle of the night, but I’ve used it for 3 weeks now and haven’t had any issues! You can feel the device pulling your nostrils in a way that opens up the air passage. It’s definitely easier to breathe through my nose!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This us small and unobtrusive, and I wake up more rested that without!
customer_reviews.author: Nii N. Armar

customer_reviews.title: I AM NO LONGER A SNORER!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said I snored! I don’t snore...now, after getting the anti snoring device silicone. I still do not admit to snoring, but since purchasing this device, my hubby says my snoring has gone away. It is easy to use and comfortable. I use it nightly and also believe it has helped with dissipation of sinus headaches. I am a fan! Two devices in the box, too!
customer_reviews.author: smithy1965

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. I no longer wake up with the soreness I used to have in the back of my throat upon waking. Is very easy to clean and care for. The carry case is very small making it easy to just drop it in your pocket and take it with you when you need to spend nights away from home. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. McCarty

customer_reviews.title: It's a Miracle.
customer_reviews.text: I got the these for my husband, who by the way snores so loud that you can hear him from outside the house....seriously! Came across these little doodads and holy sweet baby Jesus do they ever work. I can finally get some sleep !!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Rosa Beck

customer_reviews.title: Makes breathing at night so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Reduced snoring considerably. Occasionally falls off and I don't know til morning, so I snore those nights. That is the only down side. Most nights, very minimal snoring. I know this because I have the Snore Lab app on my phone and it monitors my snoring. If I didn't look odd, I'd wear it all the time to make my breathing easier and reduce my mouth breathing! Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Akin

customer_reviews.title: Helped to improve my breathing and sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The Anti snoring Device Silicone Magnetic Anti Snore Nose Clip is easy to use. It just slides right into the nose like a nose ring. It opened up my nasal passages and has helped me to have more continuous sleep during the night. It is easy to clean each day after use. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peters Partners Design

customer_reviews.title: Snore No More
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Magnetic Anti Snore Nose Clip after my kids told me I snore at night. It is very easy to use. It took a while to get used to sleeping with it at night only because I wasn’t used to having something in my nose. The price is good so I purchased 2; one for home and one for when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me from snoring
customer_reviews.text: When I use this clip, I do not snore. It's more comfortable than some of the items I found in my local drugstore, like the cones you put in your nostrils - so uncomfortable - and breathrite strips - messed up my skin. This clip also fits my nose on both sides, even the side my septum deviates into, whereas the cones wouldn't fit in there. Overall, I am very satisfied with how it works. My one complaint is that of the 2 clips that came in my package, one wasn't sealed right, so bacteria got in around the magnet, also, the magnet from the other side ended up in the contaminated side. Maybe I can get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Makes a Difference
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this item a try. I hadn't seen it before, but I thought that it was worth a look see for the price. It took a little bit of getting used to, putting something in my nose each night, but according to my wife, I am less restless and it helps with my snoring problem. I will definitely keep using this product!
customer_reviews.author: RonnieDog1973

customer_reviews.title: It helps!
customer_reviews.text: This is from the wife as a review. Yes! It helps. Perfect? No, but a substantial decrease in the volume of his snoring. As I'm not thrilled with surgical offerings to fix his snoring, this was an inexpensive helpful fix. I would certainly recommend it for other sleepless spouses!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It comes out at night...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works for half a night. Magnet seems not to be so powerful and it comes out in the middle of the night so my wife is not that happy.. we will try for more and time and see. We got this because of the magnet but it seems to work the same as other sets with no magnet..
customer_reviews.author: M. Keever

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful
customer_reviews.text: Received item so very quick and spouse had the previous device for mouth breathing, that he uses constantly even inside of the discomfort. With his combined mouth and nose snoring we hoped for the best. It failed miserably but what was to be expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't have any luck with it. Didn't help with snoring at all .
customer_reviews.author: Terri Daktal

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I keep each other awake with our snoring. We've tried different things to no avail. These work, no snoring at all! They are comfortable, and I've ordered more for traveling. There's no way they can just fall out, they fit great, tight enough and not painful at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It instantly relieves my husbands snoring and helps him breathe comfortably throughout the night. He says it’s also comfortable and doesn’t cause any pressure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the answer to my husbands freight train snoring!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the answer to my husbands freight train snoring! I was desperate ya’all!!!! I bought all kind of things to help with his snoring when I came across these gems and decided to give them a try and I’m so glad I did because they work!! They worked so good I decided to give them a try (2 in a pack) and I love it! I feel like I get a better nights sleep! Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Helps ease the thunder
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my husband needed a new bad habit, so he has begun snoring. It's been getting progressively worse over the last year. He is a very sound sleeper and I can't sleep at all with the racket he makes. This nose ring seems to help, although if he's on his back he still snores quite loudly. When he sleeps on his side, the anti snoring device does help the snoring to stop. I think it becomes a little itchy because he brushes it out, sometimes, in his sleep and we have to look thru the covers to find it the next morning, but he says it's comfortable and he doesn't even realize he scratches it out of his nose.
customer_reviews.author: GG in VA

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, as long as it stays in
customer_reviews.text: My partner has told me I don't snore with this on. I'm so happy to find a product that isn't as invasive as other ones. The only problem is that I move around a lot, and sometimes it falls out in the middle of the night. However if you are a calm sleeper this would be worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Substantially reduces advising snoring. Comfortable. Does not cause jaw pain or inhibit swallowing like the oral devices. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amhealth

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever used a product like this and I was quite skeptical. However, I was driving my husband to wearing earplugs so I thought I’d give it a try. I have to say, I was quite pleased. They are in a very clean and handy case, and they are quite easy to use. I thought they’d be tight and uncomfortable because of the magnets, but not at all! Did not interfere with my sleep at all and it did cut down on my snoring. I know this cause I have an app that records me all night. It did not make it disappear entirely, but made a significant difference. Overall, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Merrells customer!

customer_reviews.title: Seems Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dad who has had issues with snoring. He has reported that it is both comfortable and he is getting into deep enough sleep that he has started having dreams again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This product seems to help reduce snoring if you have a deviated septum
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different products, from mouth guards to nose clips as well as nose plugs that open up the airway. This is one of the least intrusive products I tried that actually reduces snoring. I noticed that it especially works for snoring caused by a deviated septum. It’s a bit uncomfortable but definitely more comfortable than a month guard.
customer_reviews.author: Fares Bdeir

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize just how badly I needed this device
customer_reviews.text: Using the magnetic anti snore nose clip, I am able to breath easier and sleep better at night. I never had trouble with snoring, but I have a deviated septum that only allows me to breath from one side of my nose while laying down. With this clip, I am able to breath enough through the other side so I don't constantly wake up to due to discomfort. The clip can be uncomfortable if you put it in wrong. Make sure to try different points of the nose to rest the magnets on. When you find a position that is comfortable and opens the nasal cavities you should be able to sleep like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: My order came really quickly, which is great! I was excited. So far I haven't felt a huge difference with sleep but thats probably because I keep knocking it out during sleep because its not comfortable. Might just not be my thing tho. 😂
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-snore nose clip!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m loving this product! Although it took a bit of getting used to, my snoring has been nearly eliminated. I ask my husband nearly every morning if I snored, and only a couple times he has commented that, yes, I was snoring A little bit but it was very minimal and not at all like it used to be. Thank you for your great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Gillan

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My wife tells me that I used to snore on a regular basis over the last 10+ years we've been married, e.g., once or twice per night and loud enough to wake her up but usually not loud enough or disruptive enough to wake me. I've been using this nose clip nightly for the last 2 months. As far as my wife can tell, I haven't snored once since I started using it. The reason I only gave this clip 4 starts for comfort is because it makes my nostrils itch occasionally. I could probably eliminate the nostril itch altogether by trimming my nose hairs, but it hasn't bothered me enough to do anything about it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsons

customer_reviews.title: But!!!! It really works.
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning I was skeptical about it, how such a simple thing would treat snore. Anyways I decided to give it a try specialty because it’s so easy to use. Believe it or not For my astonishment it did worked and my wife was the first one to celebrate and the one who reported it.
customer_reviews.author: Eliezer Santos

customer_reviews.title: Falls out when sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: This small product is magical. The only thing I dislike about it is that it falls out when I'm sleeping. Maybe if the magnet was stronger it wouldn't. So easy to to travel with and non invasive. Needed a better solution than just the nose strips.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

product_meta.title: Latest Anti snoring Device Silicone Magnetic Anti Snore Nose Clip Effective-Easy Stop Snoring Solution Professional Sleeping Aid Relieve Snore for Men Women (2 pcs)
product_meta.description:
Two Parallel Arms-Fits within the nose of the wearer and surrounds the septum within the nose.


(Ends of these arms are curved inwards to apply a constant pressure against the septum of the nose. "Acupressure" points are located inside the nostrils which are directly related to throat muscles. These two curved arms applies particular pressure to these acupressure points which stimulates throat muscles and prevents throat muscle relaxation ultimately leading to clearing of airway. )

Specially developed Magnets-Special type of magnets with specific gauss power generates specific magnetic field which stimulates local sensory nerves which helps reduce snoring.

Magnets also stimulate flow of Blood present inside Blood capillaries by stimulating Hb; a type of Iron. Also helps in applying constant pressure.
feature_bullets: Stop Snoring Naturally: Our Anti Snore nose Clip has been scientifically designed to ease snoring. Absolutely no side effects as there is no use of any chemical, medicine or similar.
Safe & No Side Effect: The anti snoring device made up of Non-Toxic material.
Easy to Use: Insert gently into nose and it will work. No need for long list of direction.s.
Comfortable to Wear & Fit Perfectly:The soft and enhanced silicone gives comfortable feeling.
Hygiene Case Included: Packaged in a reusable plastic case to keep the Anti Snore nose Clip clean and free of dust. Also perfect to use as a travel case.
